text: "The Logical Song" is a 1979 song by English rock band Supertramp. It is the leading single to their sixth studio album Breakfast in America. It topped the single charts in Canada and it was their biggest single of 1979 in Canada. It also went to top 20 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Germany, Ireland, Italy, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Portugal, South Africa, Spain, the United Kingdom and the United States. It was covered by German group Scooter in 2001. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Supertramp songs Category:Progressive pop songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Rock ballads
title: The Logical Song
